snippet.title: Galactic Getaway - Kickstarter Trailer - PC/Mac/Switch
snippet.description:
Support Galactic Getaway on Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/akrew/galactic-getaway

Farm, tame pets, explore a planet, and play minigames with friends! From the creators of Nookazon. Coming to PC, Mac & Nintendo Switch!

💫 Galactic Getaway Socials 💫
Discord: https://discord.gg/kTy7jyKdqG
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/galacticgetaway.gg
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlayGalacticGwy
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@galacticgetaway

💫 About Galactic Getaway 💫
GG Enterprises has recently discovered a new solar system and has selected you to develop a settlement on one of its four planets.

Multiplayer - Play with up to 60 people at once as you build on your planet or just hang out.
Farming Alien Plants - Find new undiscovered crops and farm them to cook and attract wildlife.
Pet Companions - Make friends with wildlife that have unique abilities to help you explore your planet.
House Decorating - Customize your home and planet with unique furniture sets and create your dream bedroom, cafe, and more!
Minigames - Play team, puzzle, and drawing minigames to collect coins for furniture, clothing, and tools.
